mapper.select: select bNo, bTitle, bDate, bContent, bReadCount, bCategory, mNo from blog order by bDate desc
select bNo, bTitle, bDate, bContent, bReadCount, bCategory, mNo from blog where ROWNUM <= 3 order by bDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into blog(bNO, bTitle, bDate, bContent, bReadCount, bCategory, mNo) values (blog_SEQ.nextval, #{bTitle}, sysdate, #{bContent}, 0, #{bCategory}, #{mNo})
mapper.select: select br.brNo, br.brDate, br.brContent, br.brGroup, br.brStep, br.brDepth, br.mNo, br.bNo, m.mId, m.mImg from blog_review br inner join member m on bNo=#{bNo} and br.mNo=m.mNo order by brDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into blog_review(brNo, brDate, brContent, brGroup, brStep, brDepth, mNo) values (blog_review_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, #{brContent}, 1, 1, 1, #{mNo})
